vn.uiza.libstream.uiza.encoder.input.gl

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.uiza.libstream.uiza.encoder.input.gl.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by loitp on 17/11/17.

    Sprite is drawn from top left of the image. Sprite positions in screen:

    0,0 100,0 ________ | | | | | Screen | | | |________|

    0,100 100,100
